title: Robber Fly
description: 3’ long, carnivorous flies with yellow and black stripes. Look similar to killer bees, which they hunt. May attack humans.
extras: Surprise: Hunt patiently. Surprise on a 1–4, when waiting in shadows for prey.	Poison immunity: Unharmed by killer bees’ poison.	Leap: Can leap up to 30’ and attack.
